lead_paragraph: A western Pennsylvania gymnastics coach convicted of sexually abusing three former students wasn't allowed to remain free on bond until sentencing after the judge learned he had been holding hands with another teen student during jury deliberations.
snippet: A western Pennsylvania gymnastics coach convicted of sexually abusing three former students wasn't allowed to remain free on bond until sentencing after the judge learned he had been holding hands with another teen student during jury deliberation...
